definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: It must be said in favour of leys that they give much more flexibility in grass land management.
sentences.chinese: 必須充分肯定輪作草場在管理方面有較大的靈活性。

sentences.english: Meadows still smell of hay and the sweetness of cut grass.
sentences.chinese: 草場上披髮着新草垛及新刈綠草的清噴香。

sentences.english: Cattle are grazing on the pasture.
One day in early summer I walked past a beautiful meadow.
sentences.chinese: 一天初夏，我走過一塊美麗的草場。

sentences.english: The grass skiing area was next to the cock fighting place.
sentences.chinese: 鬥雞場的旁邊就是滑草場。

sentences.english: Picturesque English landscapes began as pastures.
sentences.chinese: 詩情畫意的英式景觀始於草場。

sentences.english: He makes a resting-place for me in the green fields: he is my guide by the quiet waters.
sentences.chinese: 他使我臥在青綠的草場，又領我走進幽靜的水旁。

sentences.english: Large areas of rough grazings were brought under the plow.
sentences.chinese: 大面積的劣等草場均進行了翻耕。

sentences.english: On a day in the autumn, I saw a prairie eagle mortally wounded by a rifle shot.
sentences.chinese: 一天，我看見草場上躺着一隻重傷的老鷹。

sentences.english: They journeyed to the entrance of Gedor, to the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.
sentences.chinese: 他們往平原東邊基多口去，尋找牧放羊羣的草場。

sentences.english: Woe be unto the pastors that destroy and scatter the sheep of my pasture! saith the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華說，那些殘害，趕散我草場之羊的牧人有禍了。

sentences.english: It is impracticable to go for early bite from longer leys.
sentences.chinese: 利用長期輪作草場進行早期放牧是不切實際的。

sentences.english: The game of golf is played on a huge grass-covered golf course.
sentences.chinese: 高爾夫球運動在寬闊的高爾夫草場上進行。

sentences.english: There is a flagstaff in the centre of the field.
Grassland is, first and foremost, a state of mind.
sentences.chinese: 《草場地》，最先也最重要的，是一種精神狀態。

sentences.english: He galloped over the winter - dried grass of Richmond Park .
sentences.chinese: 他在里士滿公園冬天凍枯了的草場上馳騁起來。

definition: green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
as far as the eye can see (idiom)
Dulan county in Haixi Mongol and Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海西蒙古族藏族自治州[Hai3 xi1 Meng3 gu3 zu2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
Wusu city in Tacheng prefecture 塔城地區|塔城地区[Ta3 cheng2 di4 qu1], Xinjiang
strategically situated and easy to defend/strategic location
Daxing'anling mountain range in northwest Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China/Daxing'anling prefecture
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
